channel.title: About on Ammar Asmro
channel.description: Recent content in About on Ammar Asmro

item.title: About
item.description: I just finished my master of engineering program, my focus was on Software engineering & Intelligent Systems. I’m interested in building solutions, explore new software engineering techniques, and solve problems. A big part of my program was related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, and I built few projects using them too. I’m looking for a place that will allow me to practice and develop the skills that I have acquired so far.
